Save Original Files Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Click the Build button in the Source Distribution Properties dialog box to display this dialog box. This dialog box appears only if the VI hierarchy contains unsaved files. LabVIEW needs to save the original files before creating the VI hierarchy copy. If you choose not to save these files, the build cannot complete.

This dialog box includes the following component:

  • Original files that will be saved—Lists the original files that LabVIEW needs to save to complete the build operation.
